Major: Bachelor of Engineering (Honors) in Industrial Systems Engineering, Minor in Computer Science
Remarks: Part of the NUS College multidisciplinary programme, formerly known as USP
Recipient of the NUS Merit Scholarship (Academic Excellence, Leadership)

ActivityRemarks: Research Topic -  Explainable Artificial Intelligence: Identifying keywords in sentiment-based text analysis
In partnership with Reichman University, NOC offers a unique entrepreneurship education in Israel (Tel Aviv) in the form of entrepreneurship courses and an onsite internship with a startup
Research Topic - Dynamic Pricing and Third-Party Delivery Services in Single-Day Last Mile Delivery Fulfilment for Singapore
Built a simulation model that identifies threshold values of key variables (Number of orders in a day) and recommends different management strategies to minimise cost for e-commerce companies
